name: terminal-sounds
description: Plays sounds on terminal events: open, close, command start, success, and failure.

terminalSounds.enabled.description: Enable or disable all terminal sounds.

terminalSounds.sounds.terminalOpened.description: Play a sound when a terminal is opened.

terminalSounds.sounds.terminalClosed.description: Play a sound when a terminal is closed.

terminalSounds.sounds.commandStarted.description: Play a sound when a command starts executing (requires shell integration).

terminalSounds.sounds.commandSucceeded.description: Play a sound when a command completes successfully (requires shell integration).

terminalSounds.sounds.commandFailed.description: Play a sound when a command fails with a non-zero exit code (requires shell integration).

terminalSounds.customSounds.terminalOpen.description: Absolute path to a custom .wav file for terminal opened. Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.customSounds.terminalClos.description: Absolute path to a custom .wav file for terminal closed. Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.customSounds.commandStart.description: Absolute path to a custom .wav file for command started. Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.customSounds.commandSucce.description: Absolute path to a custom .wav file for command succeeded. Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.customSounds.commandFaile.description: Absolute path to a custom .wav file for command failed. Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.commandSounds.enabled.description: Play command-specific sounds for recognized commands (git, npm, etc.). Overrides generic success sound.

terminalSounds.commandSounds.custom.git.description: Custom .wav file path for git commands. Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.commandSounds.custom.pack.description: Custom .wav file path for package manager commands (npm install, yarn, pip, etc.). Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.commandSounds.custom.buil.description: Custom .wav file path for build/run commands (npm run, make, docker, python, etc.). Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.commandSounds.custom.navi.description: Custom .wav file path for navigation commands (cd, ls, ssh, find, grep, etc.). Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.commandSounds.custom.netw.description: Custom .wav file path for network commands (curl, wget, ping, dig, etc.). Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.commandSounds.custom.file.description: Custom .wav file path for file operation commands (cp, mv, rm, mkdir, tar, etc.). Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.commandSounds.custom.clou.description: Custom .wav file path for cloud/infra commands (kubectl, terraform, aws, gcloud, etc.). Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.commandSounds.custom.data.description: Custom .wav file path for database commands (mysql, psql, mongo, redis-cli, etc.). Leave empty to use built-in sound.

terminalSounds.commandSounds.custom.test.description: Custom .wav file path for test runner commands (jest, pytest, vitest, mocha, etc.). Leave empty to use built-in sound.
